meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x for Scala next steps
meta.summary: This blog post gives an overview of the current plans for the vertx-lang-scala module, in particular with respect to the upcoming Vert.x 4.

meta.title: VS Code Vert.x Starter Extension
meta.summary: Today, we are really excited to announce the Visual Studio Code Vert.x Starter extension. It allows you to create a Vert.x project, customize the creation, and search for dependencies.

meta.title: New community channels
meta.summary: In order to better support the community, we (the core team and module maintainers) now also provide help on Stack Overflow and Gitter.

meta.title: Google Summer of Code 2018
meta.summary: It's this time of year again! Google Summer of Code 2018 submission period has just started!

meta.title: An Eclipse Vert.x Gradle Plugin
meta.summary: The new Vert.x Gradle plugin offers an opinionated plugin for building Vert.x applications with Gradle.

meta.title: Preview of a guide for Java developers
meta.summary: We are introducing the book “A gentle guide to asynchronous programming with Eclipse Vert.x for enterprise application developers”.
